description: This Java class 'JDParserService' is part of a backend service responsible for parsing job description files. It extracts text from uploaded files, identifies skills and keywords within the text, and derives a job title. It interacts with a JobRepository to save the parsed JobDescription objects.

classes.name: JDParserService
classes.description: A service class for extracting and parsing content from job description files, identifying skills and keywords, and persisting JobDescription objects.

methods.name: parseAndPersist
methods.description: Extracts text from a file, parses skills and keywords, guesses a title, and saves the JobDescription.

methods.name: persistFromRawText
methods.description: Creates and saves a JobDescription based on raw text input and a given title.

methods.name: extractText
methods.description: Uses Apache Tika to extract text content from a given file path.

methods.name: extractSkills
methods.description: Identifies known skills within the text based on a predefined list.

methods.name: extractKeywords
methods.description: Extracts the top 30 keywords based on frequency in the text.

methods.name: guessTitle
methods.description: Attempts to determine the job title from the text by looking for lines containing keywords like 'engineer', 'developer', or 'manager'.
